entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 10:21PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Areas of Near Freezing Temperatures Possible... Temperatures are expected to fall into the mid and lower 30s by dawn. Overnight breezes should prevent frost for most locations, though it is possible in some sheltered locations that see lighter winds.
